_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
December 18th, 1:50 PM
Good afternoon riders and skiers! Today has been a wonderful day on the mountain, with base temps in the mid 30's and low 30's at the summit. We started the day under beautiful sunny skies and gusty winds which will provide powdery drifts and scours across the mountain. Winds of this nature can affect lift operations, so stay tuned to the snow report for up-to-date operations. Look forward to machine groomed spring conditions across the mountain, with a fresh corduroy awaiting you on 19 trails. Today we offer 280 skiable acres served by 5 lifts and 67 open trails. North Lynx terrain is open for hiking till 3:00 PM.

Tomorrows forecast calls for even warmer temps accompanied by rain throughout the day. Leading to all-natural terrain closing in efforts of preservation, Castlerock will not be spinning as well as North Lynx hiking will be closed. Time for some good news. Gate House terrain will provide soft, easy-going groomers, and is also host to 4 freestyle features on Slowpoke. Mid-mountain terrain will have you thinking its April with soft buttery snow, get it before it's gone!

Operations are back to weekday hours, which means lower mountain lifts spin from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM and upper mountain lifts spin from 9:00 AM to 3:45 PM. Reminder, terrain off upper mountain lifts is for advanced skiers and riders only.  The Sugarbush Parks crew is assembling a freestyle setup for opening day at Mt. Ellen with 14 features and 2 jumps. Speaking of Mt. Ellen, opening day has shifted back to Saturday at 8:00 AM due to the incoming weather event.  Plus, join us on Dec 20th at 3:00 PM, at Green Mountain Lodge for our Champagne Cowbell Party, celebrating Mt. Ellen's return with friends and family. Check out all of our winter events!

ALL uphill travel is CLOSED- we kindly ask you respect our hardworking operations team.   

Have an Ikon Base Pass? Come ski before 12/25 and earn a voucher for an unrestricted lift ticket for yourself to be used any day here for the rest of the season. Grab up to five of these tickets simply by skiing and riding here before Christmas. Don't miss out on all of our deals including 50% off December lodging through December 26th.
